process.name: Utility - XML2Collection
process.narrative: There can be multiple nested DataTables in XML, in that case GetDataSet will return them all.

subsheet.name: Read DataSet from XML String (no Schema)
Read DataSet from XML string (with Schema)
Read DataTable from XML String (no Schema)
Read DataTable from XML String (with Schema)
Read DataTable from XML file (with Schema)

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

stage.name: Read DataTable from XML String (no Schema)
stage.narrative: Get DataTable by Name or Index, first one if both are empty.

input.name: TableIndex
input.narrative: Table index to get if TableName is empty. Default is 0

output.name: hasDataTable
output.narrative: Returns False if DataTable not found

stage.name: XMLGetDataTable
Read DataSet from XML String (no Schema)
stage.narrative: Get all DataTables present in XML.

input.name: withDataTables
input.narrative: Return DataTables in a separate column. Default is True.

output.name: XMLDataSet
output.narrative: Result as Collection of all DataTables present in XML

stage.name: XMLGetDataSet

input.name: ignoreSchema
input.narrative: Don't export inline Schema. You can't reimport it back as DataTable if set to True. Default is False

stage.name: Read DataTable from XML file (with Schema)

input.name: ignoreSchema
input.narrative: Don't export inline Schema. You can't reimport it back as DataTable if set to True. Default is False

input.name: withDataTables

output.narrative: Result as Collection of all DataTables present in XML
